text: SKA Saint Petersburg () is a Russian professional ice hockey club based in St. Petersburg. They are members of the Bobrov Division in the Kontinental Hockey League. They first started to play in 1946, and played for the championship in 2015 and won. They are owned by Gazprom Export, a gas company owned by Russia, and have many people go to their games. The team was first a part of the Soviet Army. == Other websites == * Official website Category:Ice hockey teams in Russia Category:1946 establishments in the Soviet Union
title: SKA Saint Petersburg
